item.title: componentarchive
item.description: Usage # ocm create componentarchive [<options>] <component> <version> <provider> <path> {--provider <label>=<value>} {<label>=<value>} Description # Create a new component archive. This might be either a directory prepared to host component version content or a tar/tgz file. The –type option accepts a file format for the target archive to use. The following formats are supported: directory tar tgz The default format is directory. It the option –scheme is given, the given component descriptor format is used/generated.

item.title: rsakeypair
item.description: Usage # ocm create rsakeypair [<private key file> [<public key file>]] {<subject-attribute>=<value>} Description # Create an RSA public key pair and save to files. The default for the filename to store the private key is rsa.priv. If no public key file is specified, its name will be derived from the filename for the private key (suffix .pub for public key or .cert for certificate). If a certificate authority is given (–cacert) the public key will be signed.

item.title: transportarchive
item.description: Usage # ocm create transportarchive [<options>] <path> Description # Create a new empty OCM/OCI transport archive. This might be either a directory prepared to host artefact content or a tar/tgz file. Options # -f, --force remove existing content -h, --help help for transportarchive -t, --type string archive format (default "directory") See Also # ocm create â€” Create transport or component archive
